mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accom a JOIN accom_category ac ON a.accom_category_no = ac.accom_category_no WHERE a.accom_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accomName},'%')

SELECT ((sum(rev.review_rank)/COUNT(rev.review_rank))*10) FROM accom a LEFT JOIN room r ON r.accom_no = a.accom_no LEFT JOIN reserve re ON r.room_no = re.room_no LEFT JOIN payment pa ON pa.reserve_no = re.reserve_no LEFT JOIN review rev ON rev.payment_no = pa.payment_no WHERE a.accom_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accomName},'%') GROUP BY a.accom_no ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT accom_no, host_no, admin_no, commission_no, accom_name, accom_img, accom_description, create_date, update_date FROM accom WHERE accom_no = #{accomNo}

SELECT r.room_no, r.room_name, r.room_main_img, r.room_person, r.room_price, r.room_check_in, r.room_check_out, r.room_use FROM room r LEFT JOIN accom a ON r.accom_no = a.accom_no WHERE a.accom_no = #{accomNo}
SELECT r.room_no, r.room_name, r.room_main_img, r.room_description, r.room_person, r.room_price, r.room_check_in, r.room_check_out, r.room_use FROM room r WHERE r.room_no = #{roomNo}
